info.intro: My name is Alessia and I am a software engineer based out of New York. I care about pretty designs, intuitive interfaces and accessibility.

projects.title: prattle
projects.description: Part of a school project, prattle is a web-based chat application designed and built to gain practical experience with concepts and tools explored in class.

projects.title: no panic agency
projects.description: no panic is a digital agency based out of Turin, Italy. They specialize in branding, copyrighting, social media, web and app design.

projects.title: Vilcek Foundation
projects.description: Vilcek Foundation recognizes and celebrates immigrants' success and contributions in the United States.
